phrase: Had they known about the traffic jam earlier, they would have taken a different route to avoid being late
translate: Se eles tivessem sabido sobre o engarrafamento antes, teriam pegado uma rota diferente para evitar o atraso
p1: Had they known about the traffic jam earlier
p2: They would have taken a different route to avoid being late

phrase: Despite having finished the project ahead of schedule, the team continued refining the details to ensure maximum quality
translate: Apesar de terem terminado o projeto antes do prazo, a equipe continuou refinando os detalhes para garantir a máxima qualidade
p1: Despite having finished the project ahead of schedule
p2: The team continued refining the details to ensure maximum quality

phrase: No sooner had I arrived at the station than the train departed, leaving me stranded for an hour
translate: Mal tinha chegado na estação quando o trem partiu, me deixando parado por uma hora
p1: No sooner had I arrived at the station
p2: Than the train departed, leaving me stranded for an hour

phrase: By the time she realized the importance of the event, all tickets had been sold out, disappointing her greatly
translate: Quando ela percebeu a importância do evento, todos os ingressos já tinham se esgotado, deixando-a muito desapontada
p1: By the time she realized the importance of the event
p2: All tickets had been sold out, disappointing her greatly

phrase: If he had taken the opportunity to study abroad, his career might have taken a completely different trajectory
translate: Se ele tivesse aproveitado a oportunidade de estudar no exterior, a carreira dele poderia ter seguido um caminho completamente diferente
p1: If he had taken the opportunity to study abroad

phrase: Having been exposed to various cultures during his travels, he developed a unique perspective on global issues
translate: Tendo sido exposto a várias culturas durante suas viagens, ele desenvolveu uma perspectiva única sobre questões globais
p1: Having been exposed to various cultures during his travels
p2: He developed a unique perspective on global issues

phrase: Seldom do we appreciate the small moments in life until they become distant memories
translate: Raramente apreciamos os pequenos momentos da vida até que eles se tornem memórias distantes
p1: Seldom do we appreciate the small moments in life
p2: Until they become distant memories

phrase: The more you practice complex sentence structures, the easier it becomes to express nuanced ideas fluently
translate: Quanto mais você pratica estruturas complexas de frases, mais fácil fica expressar ideias nuançadas fluentemente
p1: The more you practice complex sentence structures
p2: The easier it becomes to express nuanced ideas fluently

phrase: While many focus on technical skills, developing emotional intelligence is equally vital for effective leadership
translate: Enquanto muitos focam nas habilidades técnicas, desenvolver inteligência emocional é igualmente vital para uma liderança eficaz
p1: While many focus on technical skills
p2: Developing emotional intelligence is equally vital for effective leadership

phrase: Had I not encountered such adversity early on, I might never have discovered my true strengths and resilience
translate: Se eu não tivesse enfrentado tanta adversidade cedo, talvez nunca tivesse descoberto minhas verdadeiras forças e resiliência
p1: Had I not encountered such adversity early on
p2: I might never have discovered my true strengths and resilience

phrase: Not only did she master several languages, but she also became an expert in cultural diplomacy
translate: Ela não só dominou várias línguas, como também se tornou uma especialista em diplomacia cultural
p1: Not only did she master several languages
p2: But she also became an expert in cultural diplomacy

phrase: Rarely have I witnessed such a profound transformation in someone’s attitude toward life
translate: Raramente presenciei uma transformação tão profunda na atitude de alguém em relação à vida
p1: Rarely have I witnessed such a profound transformation
p2: In someone’s attitude toward life

phrase: If you had informed me earlier about the deadline, I would have prioritized the tasks differently
translate: Se você tivesse me informado antes sobre o prazo, eu teria priorizado as tarefas de forma diferente
p1: If you had informed me earlier about the deadline

phrase: Having worked in several industries, he gained invaluable insights into diverse business models

phrase: The more one understands history, the better equipped they are to avoid repeating past mistakes
translate: Quanto mais alguém entende a história, mais preparado fica para evitar repetir erros do passado

phrase: Despite the challenges faced, the team succeeded in launching the product ahead of time

phrase: Had they anticipated the consequences, they might have reconsidered their decision

phrase: Only by embracing change can we truly grow both personally and professionally

phrase: No matter how skilled you are, continuous learning is essential to stay relevant in today’s world

phrase: Seldom do we realize the impact of our daily choices on the environment until it’s too late

phrase: Despite the criticism, she remained steadfast in pursuing her innovative ideas

phrase: If only I had listened more carefully, the outcome might have been different

phrase: Having completed the course, students are expected to apply their knowledge in real-world scenarios
